name: mudb-root-repo
description: Root directory for project. Contains scripts to run

scripts.docs: mdtoc < README-toc.md > README.md && mdtoc < mudb/README-toc.md > mudb/README.md && mdtoc < munet/README-toc.md > munet/README.md && mdtoc < muschema/README-toc.md > muschema/README.md && mdtoc < mustream/README-toc.md > mustream/README.md
scripts.link-muschema: cd muschema && rm -rf node_modules && npm i && npm run do-link
scripts.link-munet: cd munet && rm -rf node_modules && npm i && npm run do-link && npm link muschema
scripts.link-mudb: cd mudb && rm -rf node_modules && npm i && npm run do-link && npm link muschema && npm link munet
scripts.link-all: npm run link-muschema && npm run link-munet && npm run link-mudb

author: Mikola Lysenko
